submission:
class Solution:
    def numberOfAlternatingGroups(self, colors: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        ret = []
        i = 0
        j = 1
        num_found = 0
    
        while j < len(colors) + k and i < len(colors):
            temp_j = j
            temp_end = temp_j % len(colors)  
            while colors[temp_end] != colors[temp_end - 1] and (temp_j < (len(colors) + k - 1)):
                temp_j += 1
                temp_end = temp_j % len(colors)


            num_found += max(temp_j - i - k + 1, 0)
            i = temp_j
            j = i + 1
        return num_found
